00020   // estimator will be applied on.

00046

00048   void determine_covariance( rgrl_set_of<rgrl_match_set_sptr> const& matches, rgrl_transformation_sptr current_trans) const;
00049 
00050   //: Return the estimation statistics
00051   //  for each iteration, the stats are
00052   //    "determinant of DeltaR before orthonormalization",
00053   //    "fro norm of orthonormalized DeltaR - I",
00054   //    "fro norm of DeltaTrans"
00055   inline vcl_vector<vcl_vector<double> > const& get_stats() { return this->stats; }
00056

00058   rgrl_type_macro( rgrl_est_rigid, rgrl_nonlinear_estimator );
